reviewText: This was my favorite movie when I was a little girl. My mom and I would have a horror movie night ecerybweekend and this movie was always there to comfort me afterwards.  5 stars!
Amazing. It came in great time. And was in good condition. Great
Thanks you so much I love it!!!

secure place to buy even if it didn't work out ... this was a rare video so replacement was impossible, no fault to the company and kudos to the customer service, they didn't make me send it back to prove it was damage but took my word for it which I appreciated

As a child- this movie along with it's sequel were among my favorite movies as a kid. The movie was origanally in a different Language and was re dubbed in English- the acting and the animation are a bit over the top- but that adds to the movie. i watched it with my nieces and nepews who are between the ages of 3 and 5 and they all enjoyed it as did i. Plus it was narrated by Elvira which added to the appeal of the film. the animation and all my be considered corny by todays standards but it is still a great family film.
I found this very interesting and amusing. The imagination of the makers is so refreshing.

A cute approach to making introducing your small fry to the wonderful world of vampires.  It will be interesting to see if this innoculates the little tykes when they upgrade to Lugosi, Langella, et al.  This is what happens in a world where most kids are introduced to vampires with the Count on "Sesame Street."
